posts.title: String
posts.excerpt: This is a blog to show SString.
posts.text: This is a blog to show SString. StringSString12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728#include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h>#include<string.h>#define ERROR 0#define OK 1#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0#define MAXSTRLEN 255 //用户可在255以内定义最大串长 typedef unsigned char SString[MAXSTRLEN + 1]; //0号单元存放串的长度 typedef int Status;void StrPrint(SString T) ; // 输出字符串TStatus StrAssign(SString &T,char chars[]); //生成一个其值等于chars的串T Status StrCopy(SString &T,SString S); //由串S赋值得串TStatus ClearString(SString &S); //将串置空Status StrDestory(SString &T); //销毁Status StrEmpty(SString S); //判空int StrCompare(SString S,SString T); //S>T 返回>0 S=T 返回0 S<T 返回<0int StrLength(SString S); //返回串长度Status Concat(SString &T,SString S1,SString S2); //连接串 S1S2 未截断返回 1 截断返回 0 Status SubString(SString &Sub,SString S,int pos,int len); //用Sub返回串S的自第pos个字符起长度为len的子串int Index(SString S,SString T,int pos); //返回子串T在主串S中第pos个字符之后的位置 若不存在，则函数值为0Status StrInsert(SString &S,int pos,SString T); //在串S的第pos个字符前插入串T 完全插入返回1 部分插入返回0Status StrDelete(SString S,int pos,int len) ; // 从串S中删除自第pos个字符起长度为len的子串Status Replace(SString &S,SString T,SString V); //用V替换主串S中出现的所有与T相等的不重叠的子串 StrPrint12345678// 输出字符串Tvoid StrPrint(SString T) { int i; for(i=1;i<=T[0];i++) printf("%c",T[i]); printf("\n"); } StrAssign 12345678910111213141516//生成一个其值等于chars的串T Status StrAssign(SString &T,char chars[]){ int i; if(strlen(chars) > MAXSTRLEN){ printf(">串长超过最大串长"); return ERROR; }else{ T[0] = strlen(chars); //T[0]存放串长度 for(i=1 ; i<=T[0] ; i ++) T[i] = *(chars+i-1); //逐个赋值 return OK; } } StrCopy 123456789//由串S赋值得串TStatus StrCopy(SString &T,SString S){ int i; for(i=0 ; i<=S[0] ; i++) //赋值(带0一起复制) T[i] = S[i]; return OK; } ClearString123456//将串置空Status ClearString(SString &S){ S[1] = '\0'; S[0] = 0;} StrDestory123456//销毁Status StrDestory(SString &T){ ClearString(T); return OK;} StrEmpty123456789//判空Status StrEmpty(SString S){ if(S[0] == 0) //0号存储字符串长度 return TRUE; else return FALSE; } StrCompare1234567891011//S>T 返回>0 S=T 返回0 S<T 返回<0int StrCompare(SString S,SString T){ int i; for( i=1 ; i<=S[0]&&i<=T[0] ; i++ ) if(S[i] != T[i]) //不相等 返回ascll码差值 return S[i] - T[i]; return S[0] - T[0]; //包含关系 返回长度差值 } StrLength12345//返回串长度int StrLength(SString S){ return S[0];} Concat 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526//连接串 S1S2 未截断返回 1 截断返回 0 Status Concat(SString &T,SString S1,SString S2){ int i,j; if( S1[0] + S2[0] <= MAXSTRLEN){ //未截断 T[0] = S1[0] + S2[0]; for( i=1 ; i <= S1[0] ; i++ ) //连接S1 T[i] = S1[i]; for( j=1 ; j <= S2[0] ; j++ ) //连接S2 T[i++] = S2[j]; return OK; }else{ //截断 for( i=1 ; i <= S1[0] ; i++ ) //连接S1 T[i] = S1[i]; for( j=1 ; i <= MAXSTRLEN ; j++ ) //连接S2 T[i++] = S2[j]; T[0] = MAXSTRLEN; return FALSE; }} SubString 12345678910111213//用Sub返回串S的自第pos个字符起长度为len的子串Status SubString(SString &Sub,SString S,int pos,int len){ int i; if( pos<1 || pos>S[0] || len<0 || len>S[0]-pos+1) //条件错误 return ERROR; for( i=1 ; i<=len ; i++) //赋值 Sub[i] = S[pos+i-1]; Sub[0] = len; return OK;} Index1234567891011121314151617181920//返回子串T在主串S中第pos个字符之后的位置 若不存在，则函数值为0。 int Index(SString S,SString T,int pos){ //算法改进 --查找字符串 (KMP) int i,n,m; SString sub; if( 1<=pos && pos<=S[0]){ //位置合理 n = S[0]; m = T[0]; i = pos; while( i <= n-m+1 ){ SubString(sub,S,i,m); if(StrCompare(sub,T) != 0) i++; else return i; } } return 0;} StrInsert 1234567891011121314151617181920212223//在串S的第pos个字符前插入串T 完全插入返回1 部分插入返回0 Status StrInsert(SString &S,int pos,SString T){ int i; if( pos<1 || pos>S[0]+1 ) //插入位置(1-S[0]+1) return ERROR; if(S[0]+T[0]<=MAXSTRLEN){ //完全插入 for( i=S[0]; i>=pos ;i-- ) S[i+T[0]] = S[i]; //插入点后面的字符串向后位移Strlen(T) for( i=pos; i<pos+T[0] ; i++) S[i] = T[i-pos+1]; S[0] += T[0]; return OK; }else{ //部分插入 for( i=MAXSTRLEN;i>=pos+T[0];i--) S[i] = S[i-T[0]]; for( i=pos;i<pos+T[0] && i<=MAXSTRLEN;i++ ) S[i] = T[i-pos+1]; S[0] = MAXSTRLEN; return FALSE; }} StrDelete 1234567891011// 从串S中删除自第pos个字符起长度为len的子串Status StrDelete(SString S,int pos,int len){ int i; if( pos<1 || pos>S[0]-len+1 || len<0) return ERROR; for( i=pos+len ; i<=S[0];i++) S[i-len] = S[i]; S[0] -= len; return OK;} Replace123456789101112131415161718192021222324//用V替换主串S中出现的所有与T相等的不重叠的子串 Status Replace(SString &S,SString T,SString V){ int i =1; //第一个位置开始查找 Status k; if(StrEmpty(T)) //T为空串 return ERROR; while(i){ i = Index(S,T,i); if(i){ StrDelete(S,i,StrLength(T)); k = StrInsert(S,i,V); if(!k) return ERROR; i += StrLength(V); } } return OK; } Test12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758void text(){ int i,j; Status k; char s,c[MAXSTRLEN]; SString t,s1,s2,s3,s4,s5,s6,s7; printf("请输入串s1: "); gets(c); k=StrAssign(s1,c); printf("串长为%d 串空否？%d(1:是0:否)\n",StrLength(s1),StrEmpty(s1)); StrCopy(s3,s1); printf("拷贝s1生成的串为"); StrPrint(s3); printf("请输入串s2: "); gets(c); k=StrAssign(s2,c); StrPrint(s2); Concat(t,s1,s2); printf("连接s1s2为t："); StrPrint(t); SubString(s4,t,2,4); printf("t的字串 2-4 为："); StrPrint(s4); StrDelete(t,3,3); printf("删除t的字串 3-3后："); StrPrint(t); printf("请输入插入串: "); gets(c); k=StrAssign(s5,c); StrInsert(t,3,s5); printf("在第三个位置插入后t为："); StrPrint(t); printf("请输入替换串: "); gets(c); k=StrAssign(s6,c); printf("请输入要替换串: "); gets(c); k=StrAssign(s7,c); Replace(t,s7,s6); printf("替换后t为："); StrPrint(t);}int main(){ SString T,S; char chars[] = "this is"; text(); return 0;} HString1234567891011121314151617181920212223#include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h>#include<string.h>#define ERROR 0#define OK 1#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0typedef int Status;typedef struct{ char * ch; int length;}HString;Status StrAssign(HString &T,char *chars); //生成一个其值等于串常量chars的串Tint StrLength(HString S); //返回S元素个数 即串S的长度int StrCompare(HString S,HString T); //S>T 返回大于0 S<T 返回小于0Status ClearString(HString &S); //将S变为空串 并释放S所占空间Status Concat(HString &T,HString S1,HString S2); //T返回S1与S2连接而成的串Status SubString(HString &Sub,HString S,int pos,int len); //返回串S第pos个元素起长度为len的字串 StrAssign123456789101112131415161718192021//生成一个其值等于串常量chars的串TStatus StrAssign(HString &T,char *chars){ int i,j; char *c; if(T.ch) //释放T原有空间 free(T.ch); for(i=0,c=chars;*c;i++,c++) ; //求chars长度 if(!i){ T.ch = NULL; T.length = 0; } else{ if(!(T.ch = (char*)malloc(i*sizeof(char)))) //申请失败 return ERROR; for(j=0 ; j<i ; j++) //复制 T.ch[j] = chars[j]; } return OK;} StrLength1234//返回S元素个数 即串S的长度int StrLength(HString S){ return S.length; } StrCompare123456789//S>T 返回大于0 S<T 返回小于0int StrCompare(HString S,HString T){ int i; for(i=0 ; i<S.length && i<T.length ; i++) if(S.ch[i] != T.ch[i]) return S.ch[i] - T.ch[i]; return S.length - T.length;} ClearString123456789//将S变为空串 并释放S所占空间Status ClearString(HString &S){ if(S.ch){ free(S.ch); S.ch = NULL; } S.length = 0; return OK;} Concat123456789101112131415161718//T返回S1与S2连接而成的串Status Concat(HString &T,HString S1,HString S2){ int i,j; if(T.ch) free(T.ch); if(!(T.ch = (char*)malloc((S1.length+S2.length)*sizeof(char)))) return ERROR; for( i=0 ; i<S1.length ; i++) T.ch[i] = S1.ch[i]; for( j=0 ; j<S2.length ; j++) T.ch[i++] = S2.ch[j]; T.length = S1.length + S2.length; return OK;} SubString12345678910111213141516171819202122//返回串S第pos个元素起长度为len的字串 Status SubString(HString &Sub,HString S,int pos,int len){ int i; if( pos<1 || pos>S.length || len<0 || len>S.length-pos+1 ) //条件错误 return ERROR; if(Sub.ch) //释放Sub原有空间 free(Sub.ch); if(!len){ //字串长度为0 Sub.ch = NULL; Sub.length = 0; }else{ Sub.ch = (char*)malloc(len*sizeof(char)); for( i=0 ; i<len ; i++ ) //复制 Sub.ch[i] = Sub.ch[i+pos-1]; Sub.length = len; }} text1234int main(){ return 0;}

posts.title: RISE
posts.excerpt: 本文含有强烈主观意愿和个人观点，慎点。
posts.text: 本文含有强烈主观意愿和个人观点，慎点。 S8 你不是不可以输，只是你们承担了太多希望

posts.title: Queue
posts.excerpt: This is a blog to show SqQueue and LinkQueue.
posts.text:
This is a blog to show SqQueue and LinkQueue. QueueSqQueue顺序队列有八个操作：初始化、判空、销毁、置空、求长、获取队头、入队、出队 代码头123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627#include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h> #define ERROR 0#define OK 1#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0typedef int QElemType;typedef int Status; #define QUEUE_INIT_SIZE 100 //栈的大小#define STACKINCREMENT 10 //栈的增量typedef struct{ //栈的结构体 QElemType * base; QElemType front; QElemType rear; int queuesize;}SqQueue;/* 队列的顺序存储结构*/ 初始化12345678910111213141516//初始化Status InitQueue(SqQueue &Q){ Q.base = (QElemType *)malloc(QUEUE_INIT_SIZE * sizeof(QElemType)); //分配空间 if(!Q.base){ //判断是否申请成功 Q.queuesize = 0; return ERROR; } Q.rear = 0; Q.front = 0; Q.queuesize = QUEUE_INIT_SIZE; return OK;} 判空12345678//判断是否为空队列 Status QueueEmpty(SqQueue &Q){ if(Q.front == Q.rear) return TRUE; else return FALSE;} 销毁123456//销毁Status DestroyQueue(SqQueue &Q){ free(Q.base); return OK; } 置空123456//置为空队列 Status ClearEmpty(SqQueue &Q){ Q.front = Q.rear ; return OK;} 求长12345//求队列的长度int QueueLength(SqQueue &Q){ return (Q.rear-Q.front+Q.queuesize) % Q.queuesize;} 返回队头12345678910//返回队列头元素Status GetTop(SqQueue &Q,QElemType &e){ if(QueueEmpty(Q)) return ERROR; e = Q.base[Q.front]; return OK;} 入队123456789//对尾插入Status EnQueue(SqQueue &Q,QElemType e){ Q.base[Q.rear] = e; //压栈 Q.rear = (Q.rear + 1) % Q.queuesize; return OK;} 出队123456789101112//队头删除Status DeQueue(SqQueue &Q,QElemType &e){ if(QueueEmpty(Q)) //判空 return ERROR; e = Q.base[Q.front]; //出栈 Q.front = (Q.front + 1) % Q.queuesize; return OK;} 输出123456789101112//遍历Status QueueTraverse(SqQueue Q){ if(QueueEmpty(Q)) //判空 return ERROR; while(Q.front != Q.rear) printf("%d ",Q.base[Q.front++]); //输出 printf("
"); return OK;} 测试12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364//textvoid text(){ SqQueue Q; QElemType e; InitQueue(Q); e = 1; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 2; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 3; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 4; EnQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("队列长度为：%d
",QueueLength(Q)); //队列插入为1 2 3 4 DeQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("出队元素为：%d",e); printf(" 队列长度为：%d
",QueueLength(Q)); //删除对头 DeQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("出队元素为：%d",e); printf(" 队列长度为：%d
",QueueLength(Q)); DeQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("出队元素为：%d",e); printf(" 队列长度为：%d
",QueueLength(Q)); DeQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("出队元素为：%d",e); printf(" 队列长度为：%d
",QueueLength(Q)); if(QueueEmpty(Q)) printf("栈空
"); else printf("栈不空
"); e = 1; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 2; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 3; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 4; EnQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("队列长度为：%d
",QueueLength(Q)); ClearEmpty(Q); //置空 QueueTraverse(Q); printf("队列长度为：%d
",QueueLength(Q));}int main(){ text(); return 0;} LinkQueue代码头1234567891011121314151617181920#include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h> #define ERROR 0#define OK 1#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0typedef int QElemType;typedef int Status; typedef struct QNode{ //队列结点 QElemType data; //数据域 struct QNode *next; //指针 }QNode, *QueuePtr;typedef struct{ //队列指针 QueuePtr front; //队头指针 QueuePtr rear; //队尾指针 }LinkQueue; 初始化123456789101112//初始化Status InitQueue(LinkQueue &Q){ Q.front = Q.rear = (QueuePtr)malloc(sizeof(QNode)); //申请结点 if(!Q.front) //是否申请成功 return ERROR; Q.front -> next = NULL; return OK;} 销毁12345678910//销毁队列Status DestoryQueue(LinkQueue &Q){ while(Q.front){ Q.rear = Q.front -> next; free(Q.front); Q.front = Q.rear; } } 清空123456//请空队列Status ClearQueue(LinkQueue &Q){ Q.rear = Q.front; Q.front -> next =NULL; return OK;} 判空1234567//判空Status QueueEmpty(LinkQueue &Q){ if(Q.front == Q.rear) return TRUE; else return FALSE;} 求长12345678910111213//求队列元素个数int QueueLenght(LinkQueue &Q){ QueuePtr p = Q.front -> next; int iCount=0; while(p){ iCount++; p = p -> next; } return iCount;} 返回队头12345678910//返回队头Status GetHead(LinkQueue &Q,QElemType &e){ if(QueueEmpty(Q)) return ERROR; e = Q.front -> next -> data; return OK;} 入队12345678910111213141516//插入元素Status EnQueue(LinkQueue &Q,QElemType e){ QueuePtr p = (QueuePtr)malloc(sizeof(QNode)); if(!p) return ERROR; p -> next = NULL; p -> data = e; Q.rear -> next = p; Q.rear = p; return OK;} 出队1234567891011121314151617//删除元素Status DeQueue(LinkQueue &Q,QElemType &e){ if(QueueEmpty(Q)) return ERROR; QueuePtr p = Q.front -> next; e = p -> data; Q.front -> next = p -> next; if(Q.rear == p) Q.rear = Q.front; free(p); return OK;} 输出123456789101112//遍历Status QueueTraverse(LinkQueue Q){ Q.front = Q.front -> next; while(Q.front){ printf("%d ",Q.front->data); Q.front = Q.front -> next; } printf("
"); return OK;} 测试12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364//textvoid text(){ LinkQueue Q; QElemType e; InitQueue(Q); e = 1; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 2; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 3; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 4; EnQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("队列长度为：%d
",QueueLenght(Q)); //队列插入为1 2 3 4 DeQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("出队元素为：%d",e); printf(" 队列长度为：%d
",QueueLenght(Q)); //删除对头 DeQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("出队元素为：%d",e); printf(" 队列长度为：%d
",QueueLenght(Q)); DeQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("出队元素为：%d",e); printf(" 队列长度为：%d
",QueueLenght(Q)); DeQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("出队元素为：%d",e); printf(" 队列长度为：%d
",QueueLenght(Q)); if(QueueEmpty(Q)) printf("栈空
"); else printf("栈不空
"); e = 1; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 2; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 3; EnQueue(Q,e); e = 4; EnQueue(Q,e); QueueTraverse(Q); printf("队列长度为：%d
",QueueLenght(Q)); ClearQueue(Q); //置空 QueueTraverse(Q); printf("队列长度为：%d
",QueueLenght(Q)); } int main(){ text(); return 0;}

posts.title: Stack
posts.excerpt: This is a blog to show SqStack and LinkStack.
posts.text:
This is a blog to show SqStack and LinkStack. #include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h>#include<conio.h>#define STACK_INIT_SIZE 100 //栈的大小#define STACKINCREMENT 10 //栈的增量#define OK 1#define ERROR 0#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0typedef int Status; //Status表示返回状态typedef char SElemType; //SElmType为int类型typedef struct{ //栈的结构体 SElemType * base; //栈底指针 SElemType * top; //栈顶指针 int stacksize; //栈大小 }SqStack;/* 栈的顺序存储结构*///初始化Status InitStack(SqStack &S){ S.base = (SElemType *)malloc(STACK_INIT_SIZE * sizeof(SElemType)); //分配空间 if(!S.base){ //判断是否申请成功 S.stacksize = 0; return ERROR; } S.top = S.base; S.stacksize = STACK_INIT_SIZE; //更新栈 return OK;}//判断是否为空栈Status StackEmpty(SqStack S){ if(S.base == S.top) return TRUE; else return FALSE;}//销毁Status DestroyStack(SqStack &S){ free(S.base); free(S.top); S.base = NULL; S.top = NULL; return OK; }//置为空栈Status ClearEmpyt(SqStack &S){ S.base = S.top; return OK;}//求栈的长度int StackLength(SqStack &S){ return S.top-S.base;}//返回栈顶元素Status GetTop(SqStack S,SElemType &e){ if(S.base==S.top) return ERROR; e = *(S.top-1); return OK;}//栈顶插入Status Push(SqStack &S,SElemType e){ if(S.top - S.base >= S.stacksize){ //栈满 S.base = (SElemType *)realloc(S.base,(S.stacksize+STACKINCREMENT)*sizeof(SElemType)); //申请新空间 if(!S.base){ printf("空间申请失败！"); return ERROR; } S.top = S.base + S.stacksize; //更新栈顶指针 S.stacksize += STACKINCREMENT; //更新长度 } *S.top++ = e; //压栈 return OK;}//栈顶删除Status Pop(SqStack &S,SElemType &e){ if(S.base == S.top) //判空 return ERROR; e = *--S.top; //出栈 return OK;}//遍历Status StackTraverse(SqStack S){ if(StackEmpty) //判空 return ERROR; while(S.base < S.top) printf("%c ",*(S.base++)); //输出 printf("
"); return OK;}int main(){ return 0;} #include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h>#define OK 1#define ERROR 0#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0typedef int SElemType;typedef int Status; typedef struct StackNode{ SElemType data; //数据域 struct StackNode *next; //结构体指针 }StackNode , *LinkStackPtr;typedef struct LinkStack{ //栈指针 LinkStackPtr top; //top指针 int count; //栈元素个数 }LinkStack;//初始化Status InitStack(LinkStack &S){ S.top = (LinkStackPtr)malloc(sizeof(StackNode)); //申请空间 S.count = 0; if(!S.top) //是否申请成功 return ERROR; S.top->next = NULL; //头结点指向NULL (栈底) return OK;}//判空Status StackEmpty(LinkStack &S){ return S.count == 0 ? TRUE : FALSE;} //入栈Status Push(LinkStack &S , SElemType e){ LinkStackPtr p = (LinkStackPtr)malloc(sizeof(StackNode)); //申请新节点 p -> data = e; p -> next = S.top; //结点赋值 S.top = p; S.count++; //更改链表关系 return OK;}//出栈Status Pop(LinkStack &S,SElemType &e){ if(StackEmpty(S)){ //是否栈空 printf("栈空！！！"); return ERROR; } LinkStackPtr p = S.top; //p指向栈顶 e = p->data; S.top = S.top -> next; S.count--; //更新链表关系 free(p); return OK;} //返回栈顶Status GetStack(LinkStack &S,SElemType &e){ if(StackEmpty(S)){ printf("栈空！！！"); return ERROR; } e = S.top -> data; return OK;} //获取长度int GetLengthLinkStack(LinkStack &S){ return S.count; } //输出Status Stacktraverse(LinkStack &S){ if(!S.top && S.count) return ERROR; LinkStackPtr p = S.top; while(p->next){ printf("%d",p->data); p = p -> next; } return OK; } //textvoid text(){ LinkStack S; SElemType e; LinkStack stack; InitStack(S);//初始化 e=1; Push(S, e); e=2; Push(S, e); e=3; Push(S, e); e=4; Push(S, e); printf("链栈元素："); Stacktraverse(S); printf("链栈元素个数：%d
", GetLengthLinkStack(S)); SElemType e1,e2,e3; Pop(S,e1); printf("弹出第一个元素：%d
", e1); Pop(S,e2); printf("弹出第二个元素：%d
", e2); Pop(S,e3); printf("弹出第二个元素：%d
", e3); printf("链栈元素："); Stacktraverse(S); printf("链栈元素个数：%d", GetLengthLinkStack(S)); printf("
"); GetStack(S,e3); printf("$%d",e3);} int main(){ text(); return 0;}

posts.title: List
posts.excerpt: This is a blog to show SqList LinkStack and StaticStack.
posts.text:
This is a blog to show SqList LinkStack and StaticStack. #include<stdio.h>#include<stdlib.h>#include<malloc.h>#include<conio.h>#define ERROR 0#define OK 1#define FALSE 0#define TRUE 1typedef int ElemType;typedef int Status; //返回状态 #define LIST_INIT_SIZE 100 //线性表大小 #define INIT_INCREMENT 10 //线性表增量typedef struct{ ElemType *elem; int length; int listSize;}SqList;//判断元素是否存在 存在返回i的值Status compare(ElemType e1 , ElemType e2){ if( e1 == e2 ) return TRUE; else return FALSE;}//访问每一个元素 Status visit(ElemType e){ printf("%d ",e); return OK;}//初始化线性表 Status InitList_Sq(SqList &L){ L.elem = (ElemType*)malloc(LIST_INIT_SIZE*sizeof(ElemType)); //动态分配空间 L.length = 0; //先令线性表长度为0 即使初始化失败L.length也有明确的值 if(!L.elem){ printf("初始化失败"); return ERROR; //分配失败 返回ERROR } L.listSize = LIST_INIT_SIZE; //线性表d大小 return OK; }//销毁线性表 Status DestoryList_Sq(SqList &L){ free(L.elem); //释放申请来的空间 return OK; } //清空线性表 Status ClearList_Sq(SqList &L){ L.length = 0; //长度变为0 return OK;}//判空表 空返回TRUE 否则FALSE Status ListEmpty_Sq(SqList &L){ return L.length ? TRUE : FALSE ; //长度为0则为空表 } //求线性表长度Status ListLength_Sq(SqList &L){ if(L.length == 0){ printf("线性表为空！"); return ERROR; } return L.length; //返回长度 } //用e返回第i个元素值Status GetElem_Sq(SqList &L,int i,ElemType &e){ if( L.length == 0 || i<1 || i>L.length){ printf("输入元素的位置有误"); return ERROR; } e = L.elem[i-1]; return OK;}//操作结果：返回L中第1个与e满足compare()的数据元素的位序，若这样的数据元素不存在，则返回值为0。Status LocateElem_Sq(SqList &L,ElemType &e){ int i=0; while( i<L.length && !compare(L.elem[i],e) ) i++; if(compare(L.elem[i],e)) return i; else return 0;}//操作：cur_e是L的元素且不会是第一个 则用pre_e返回他的前驱Status PriorElem_Sq(SqList &L,ElemType cur_e,ElemType &pre_e){ int i = LocateElem_Sq(L,cur_e); //获取cur_e的位置 if(i == 0) printf("cur_e不在L中或为首元素"); else pre_e = L.elem[i-1]; return OK;}//cur_e是L的元素且不会是最后一个 则用next_e返回他的后继Status NextElem_Sq(SqList &L,ElemType cur_e,ElemType &next_e){ int i = LocateElem_Sq(L,cur_e); //获取cur_e的位置 if(i == 0){ printf("该元素不在线性表中"); return ERROR; }else if(i == L.length){ printf("该元素为末元素"); return ERROR; }else next_e = L.elem[i+1]; return OK;}//在L的第i个位置之前插入新元素Status ListInsert_Sq(SqList &L, int i ,ElemType e){ //i的合法值为 1-L.length+1 if(i<1 || i>L.length+1){ printf("插入的位置有问题"); return ERROR; //i值不合法 } //若线性表已满 则分配空间 if(L.length>=L.listSize){ ElemType *newbase = (ElemType*)realloc(L.elem,(L.listSize+INIT_INCREMENT)*sizeof(ElemType)); //增加分配空间 if(!newbase){ printf("存储分配失败"); return ERROR; //是否成功分配 } L.elem = newbase; L.listSize += INIT_INCREMENT; //更改长度 } ElemType *p = &(L.elem[i-1]); //p为插入点指针 ElemType *q = &(L.elem[L.length-1]); //q为最后一个元素指针 while(p<=q){ //插入 *(q+1) = *q; q--; } *p = e; L.length++; return OK;} //删除第i个元素 用e返回 L长度减1Status ListDelete_Sq(SqList &L,int i,ElemType &e){ if(i>L.length || i<1){ //删除元素有误 printf("被删除元素位置有误"); return ERROR; } ElemType *p = &(L.elem[i-1]); //p指向被删除元素 e = *p; ElemType *q = &(L.elem[L.length-1]); //q指向末元素 while(p<q){ //删除 *p = *(p+1); p++; } L.length--; return OK; } //输出线性表 Status ListTraverse_Sq(SqList &L){ if(!L.elem){ printf("
线性表未初始化或被销毁了!!!"); return ERROR; } if(L.length==0){ printf("线性表中无元素!!!"); return ERROR; } int i; for( i = 0 ; i <L.length ; i++) visit(L.elem[i]); return OK;}//textvoid initMenu(SqList L) { printf("
		\*------------------------------------------*
"); printf("
		 初始化成功，L.length=%d
", L.length); printf("
		 1.创建随机链表	 2.遍历线性表
		 3.清空线性表		 4.线性表插入
		 5.查找表中元素"); printf("	 6.判断元素是否在表中
		 7.删除某个元素	 8.线性表长度
		 9.线性表是否为空	 10.回到主菜单
		 0.退出");}void mainMenu() { printf("
		*------------------------------------------*
"); printf("
		 欢迎回到主菜单
"); printf("
		 1.创建随机链表	 2.遍历线性表
		 3.清空线性表		 4.线性表插入
		 5.查找表中元素"); printf("	 6.判断元素是否在表中
		 7.删除某个元素	 8.线性表长度
		 9.线性表是否为空	 10.回到主菜单
		 0.退出");}void text(){ int lLength, i; ElemType e; SqList L; InitList_Sq(L); initMenu(L); int select; while(1) { printf("
请选择你的操作："); scanf("%d", &select); switch(select) { case 1: InitList_Sq(L); printf("创建随机链表："); ListTraverse_Sq(L); break; case 2: printf("遍历线性表："); ListTraverse_Sq(L); break; case 3: ClearList_Sq(L); printf("清空L后：L.length = %d
", L.length); ListTraverse_Sq(L); break; case 4: printf("请输入要插入的元素位置和元素的值(eg:1 2)："); scanf("%d %d", &i, &e); while(ListInsert_Sq(L, i, e)) { printf("插入完毕，现在线性表为："); ListTraverse_Sq(L); printf(" 是否继续？ 1.是 0.否 "); int selectAgain ; scanf("%d", &selectAgain); if(selectAgain==0) break; printf("请输入要插入的元素位置和元素的值："); scanf("%d %d", &i, &e); } printf("
"); break; case 5: printf("请输入要查找的元素位置："); scanf("%d",&i); if(GetElem_Sq(L, i, e)) printf("第%d个元素的值为：%d
", i, e); else printf("请输入正确的数字！！！
"); break; case 6: printf("请输入你想知道是否在表中的数值："); scanf("%d", &e); // 这里假定随机数组中的元素互不重复 i = LocateElem_Sq(L, e); if(i) printf("值为%d是表中的第%d个元素
", e, i); else printf("没有值为%d的元素
", e); break; case 7: printf("请输入要删除的元素位置："); scanf("%d", &i); if(ListDelete_Sq(L, i, e)){ printf("元素%d删除完毕，现在线性表为：
", e); ListTraverse_Sq(L); }else printf("
"); break; case 8: lLength = ListLength_Sq(L); printf("线性表的长度为: %d 
", lLength); break; case 9: if (!ListEmpty_Sq(L)) printf("该线性表为空.
"); else printf("该线性表非空.
"); break; case 10: mainMenu(); break; case 0: break; default: printf("请输入正确的数字!!!
"); break; } } } int main() { text(); return 0;} #include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>#include <conio.h>#include <malloc.h>#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0#define OK 1#define ERROR 0typedef int ElemType ;typedef int Status ;/* 自定义结点类型指针 结点包括数据项date和指向（struct LNode）的指针 Link Position为指向结点的指针类型 */typedef struct LNode{ ElemType date; struct LNode *next;}*Link , *Position; /* 自定义指针结构指针 head tail是Link类型指针 用来指向结点 len存储链表长度 */ typedef struct List{ Link head,tail; //分别指向头尾 int len = 0; //长度 }LinkList; /*//初始化一个空的线性链表L Status InitList_L(LinkList &L){ L.head = (Link)malloc(sizeof(struct LNode)); if(!L.head){ printf("分配空间失败"); return ERROR; } L.head->next = NULL; return OK;}*///分配p指向e的结点Status MakeNode_L(Link p,ElemType e){ p = (Link)malloc(sizeof(struct LNode)); if(p != NULL){ p -> date = e; p -> next = NULL; return OK; } return ERROR;} //释放p指向的结点Status FreeNode_L(Link &p){ free(p); p = NULL; return OK;} //创建指定长度单链表Status CreateList_L(LinkList &L,int n){ L.head = L.tail = (Link)malloc(sizeof(struct LNode)); L.head -> next = NULL; //建立一个带头节点的单链表 if(!L.head){ printf(">>初始化失败！"); return ERROR; } Link q = L.head ; //p指向头节点 printf(">>输入链表的值："); while(n--){ Link p = (Link)malloc(sizeof(struct LNode)); //申请一个新结点 scanf("%d",&p->date); //输入数据 q -> next = p; //插入到表尾 q = p; L.len++ ; //长度+1 } L.tail = q; L.tail->next = NULL; printf(">>初始化成功！
"); return OK; } //销毁线性表LStatus DestroyList_L(LinkList &L){ Link p; while(L.head != L.tail){ //头结点开始 依次释放结点 p = L.head; L.head = L.head -> next; FreeNode_L(p); } L.head = NULL; L.tail = NULL; //防止野指针 L.len = 0; return OK; }//清空线性表Status ClearList_L(LinkList &L){ if(L.len == 0) return OK; Link p,q; p = L.head -> next; while(p){ q = p -> next; FreeNode_L(p); p = q; L.len--; } L.head -> next = L.tail; printf(">>清空成功!
"); return OK;}//在链表的第一个位置插入节点，h指向头结点Status InsFirst_L(Link h,Link s){ s->next = h->next; h->next = s; return OK;}//在删除链表中第一个节点并以p返回，h为头结点指针Status DelFirst_L(Link h,Link p){ p = h->next; h->next = h->next->next; return OK;}//将s所指的一串结点连接在线性表L的最后一个结点Status Append_L(LinkList &L,Link s){ if(L.head){ L.tail -> next = s; Link temp = L.head; while(temp -> next) temp = temp -> next; L.tail = temp; //L.tail指向最后一个结点temp->next==NULL return OK; } return ERROR;} //第i个元素存在时，将第i个元素赋值个e并返回OK 否则返回ERROR Status GetELem_L(LinkList &L,int i,ElemType &e){ if(i<1) { //输入值有误 printf(">>输入值有误!"); return ERROR; } int j; Link p = L.head -> next; while( j < i && p){ //j<i且p不为空 找到第i个元素 p = p -> next; j++; } if( !p || j>i ){ printf("第%d个元素不存在",i); return ERROR; } e = p -> date; //e返回第i个元素的值 return OK; } //在第i个元素之前插入元素eStatus InsBefore_L(LinkList &L,int i,ElemType e) { Link s; Link p = L.head; int j = 0; while( p && j < i-1){ //找到第i-1个元素 并将p指向 p = p-> next; j++; } if( !p || j > i-1 ) { //输入值有误 printf(">>输入插入点有误！"); return ERROR; } s = (Link)malloc(sizeof(struct LNode)); //插入 s -> date = e; s -> next = p -> next; p -> next = s; printf(">>插入成功！
"); L.len++; //更新长度 return OK; }//向线性表末尾添加一个元素Status InsertRear_L(LinkList &L, ElemType e){ Link p = L.tail; //p指向表尾 Link q = (Link)malloc(sizeof(struct LNode)); //新建结点 q -> date = e; q -> next = p -> next; //插入 p -> next = q; p = p -> next; printf(">>插入成功！
"); L.len++; //长度+1 return OK;} //向有序链表插入一个元素 使之依然有序Status InsertOrder_L(LinkList &L,ElemType e){ Link p = L.head -> next; //p指向第一个结点 Link q = L.head; //q指向p的上一个结点 if( (p->date) > (p->next->date) ){ //判断有序还是逆序 while(p && p->date > e){ q = p; p = p->next; } }else{ while( p && p->date < e){ q = p; p = p->next; } } //此时p指向插入点 q指向插入点的上一个结点 Link z = (Link)malloc(sizeof(struct LNode)); //新建结点 z -> date = e; z -> next = q -> next; q -> next = z; printf(">>插入成功！
"); L.len++; //长度+1 return OK;} //删除第i个元素 并用e返回其值Status ListDelete_L(LinkList &L,int i,ElemType &e){ if(i > L.len){ printf(">>删除位置有误!
"); return ERROR; } int j = 0; Link q; Link p = L.head; while( p && j < i-1 ){ //寻找第i个节点 并使p指向其前驱 p = p -> next; j++; } if( !(p -> next) && j > i-1){ //结点位置错误 printf(">>删除位置有误!"); return ERROR; } q = p -> next; //删除 p -> next = q ->next; e = q ->date; free(q); printf(">>删除成功！
"); L.len--; return OK; } //删除表尾元素Status DeleteRear_L(LinkList &L,ElemType &e){ Link p = L.head ; while( (p->next) != L.tail) //p指向尾元素的前驱 p = p -> next; e = L.tail -> date; p -> next = NULL; FreeNode_L(L.tail); L.tail = p; printf(">>删除成功！
"); L.len--; return OK;} //删除给定值的第一个元素Status Delete_L(LinkList &L,ElemType e){ Link p = L.head -> next; Link q = L.head; while(p){ if(p->date == e) break; q = p; p = p -> next; } if(!p){ printf(">>输入元素在线性表L中不存在！
"); return ERROR; } q -> next = p -> next; free(p); printf(">>删除成功！
"); L.len--; return OK;} //设置p所指向节点的值Status SetCurElem(Link &p,ElemType e){ p->date = e; return OK;}//计算链表的长度int ListLength(LinkList L){ return L.len;}//p指向L的一个结点，返回p指向结点的前驱的位置 无前驱返回NULLPosition PriorPos_L(LinkList &L,Link p){ Link temp = L.head; while( temp -> next != p) temp = temp -> next; return temp;} //p指向L的一个结点，返回p指向结点的后继的位置 无后继返回NULLPosition NextPos_L(LinkList &L,Link p){ return p -> next;} //查找链表中第i个元素并以p返回Status LocatePos_L(LinkList &L,int i,Link &p){ int iCount = 0; if( i > 0 && i <= L.len){ p = L.head; while(iCount++ != i) p = p -> next; return OK; } return ERROR;} //返回头结点位置Position GetHead_L(LinkList L){ return L.head;} //返回尾结点位置Position GetLast_L(LinkList L){ return L.tail;} //查找与e相等的节点并返回该节点Position LocateElem_L(LinkList &L,ElemType e){ Link temp = L.head -> next; while( temp -> date != e ) //元素不在线性表中的情况未考虑 temp = temp -> next; return temp;}//合并两个有序表Status MergeList_L(LinkList &La,LinkList &Lb,LinkList &Lc){ //已知La，Lb为非逆序 Link pa = La.head -> next; Link pb = Lb.head -> next; Link pc; Lc = La; //La做Lc的头结点 pc = pa; while(pa && pb){ if(pa -> date <= pb -> date){ pc -> next = pa; pc = pa; pa = pa -> next; }else{ pc -> next = pb; pc = pb; pb = pb -> next; } } pc ->next = pa ? pa :pb; //插入剩余段 free(Lb.head); printf(">>合并成功!
"); return OK;}//遍历单链表Status ListTraverse_L(LinkList &L){ Link p = L.head -> next; int i = L.len; printf(">>当前单链表L = ("); while(p){ printf(" %d",p->date); p = p->next; } printf(" )
"); return OK; } //text void InitMainMenu(){ printf("
				 单链表的基本操作
"); printf("		/*--------------------------------------------------*/
"); printf("		 1.创建单链表		 2.销毁线性表
"); printf("		 3.清空单链表		 4.删除一个元素
"); printf("		 5.插入一个元素	 6.合并两个顺序表
"); printf("		 7.查找元素的前驱	 8.输出L
");} void text(){ Link p,h,s; LinkList L; LinkList La,Lb,Lc; ElemType e; int pos; int select; InitMainMenu(); while(1){ printf("
>请选择你的操作:"); scanf("%d",&select); switch(select){ case 1: printf(">>输入你想创建的链表长度:"); scanf("%d",&pos); //InitList_L(L); CreateList_L(L,pos); ListTraverse_L(L); break; case 2: DestroyList_L(L); break; case 3: ClearList_L(L); ListTraverse_L(L); break; case 4: printf(">>输入你想要的删除方式：1.指定位置删除 2.表尾删除 3.删除给定值的第一个元素 "); int deleteSelect; scanf("%d",&deleteSelect); switch(deleteSelect){ case 1: printf(">>请输入删除位置："); scanf("%d",&pos); if(ListDelete_L(L,pos,e)) printf(">>删除第%d个元素%d
",pos,e); ListTraverse_L(L); break; case 2: DeleteRear_L(L,e); printf(">>删除表尾元素%d
",e); ListTraverse_L(L); break; case 3: printf(">>请输入删除元素："); scanf("%d",&e); Delete_L(L,e); ListTraverse_L(L); break; } break; case 5: printf(">>输入你想要的插入方式：1.指定位置插入 2.表尾插入 3.有序链表插入 "); int insertSelect; scanf("%d",&insertSelect); switch(insertSelect){ case 1: printf(">>请输入插入位置和插入元素："); scanf("%d %d",&pos,&e); InsBefore_L(L,pos,e); ListTraverse_L(L); break; case 2: printf(">>请输入插入元素："); scanf("%d",&e); InsertRear_L(L,e); ListTraverse_L(L); break; case 3: printf(">>请输入插入元素："); scanf("%d",&e); InsertOrder_L(L,e); ListTraverse_L(L); break; } break; case 6: printf(">>输入第一个链表长度:"); scanf("%d",&pos); CreateList_L(La,pos); ListTraverse_L(La); printf(">>输入第二个链表长度:"); scanf("%d",&pos); CreateList_L(Lb,pos); ListTraverse_L(Lb); MergeList_L(La,Lb,Lc); ListTraverse_L(Lc); break; case 7: printf(">>请输入查找方式：1.查找固定位置元素的前驱 2.查找固定元素的前驱 "); Link k; int posSelect; scanf("%d",&posSelect); switch(posSelect){ case 1: printf(">>>请输入元素位置："); scanf("%d",&pos); if(LocatePos_L(L,pos,p)){ k = PriorPos_L(L,p); if(k == L.head) printf(">>>第1个元素无直接前驱!
"); else printf(">>>第%d个元素的前驱为：%d
",pos,k->date); }else printf(">>>输入元素位置错误!
"); break; case 2: printf(">>>请输入元素的值："); scanf("%d",&e); p = LocateElem_L(L,e); if(p != NULL){ k = PriorPos_L(L,p); if(k == L.head) printf(">>>元素%d为第1个元素无直接前驱!
",e); else printf(">>>元素%d的前驱为：%d
",e,k->date); }else printf(">>>输入元素不在单链表L中!
"); break; } break; case 8: printf(">>首指针指向：%d 尾指针指向：%d 链表长度为：%d",L.head->next->date,L.tail->date,L.len); break; } } }int main() { text(); return 0;} #include<stdio.h>#define MAXSIZE 100#define OK 1#define ERROR 0#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0typedef int Status;typedef int ElemType;typedef struct{ ElemType data; int cur;}component,SLinkList[MAXSIZE];//求链表长度int Length_SL(SLinkList S){ int j = 0; int i = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; while(i){ j++; i = S[i].cur; } return j; } //动态分配函数int malloc_SL(SLinkList S){ int i = S[0].cur; if(i == 0){ printf("备用链表为空，无法分配！"); return ERROR; } S[0].cur = S[i].cur; return i; }//freeStatus Free(SLinkList S, int k){ //将位置为k的空闲结点释放 //即插入到备用链表第一个结点前 S[k].cur = S[0].cur; S[0].cur = k; return OK;}//初始化Status InitList_SL(SLinkList S){ int i; S[MAXSIZE-1].cur = 0; //链表头结点为空 for(i = 0 ;i < MAXSIZE - 2 ; i++) S[i].cur = i+1; //备用链表 S[MAXSIZE-2].cur = 0; //链表最后一个元素为空 return OK;} //销毁Status DestoryList_SL(SLinkList S){ int i = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; S[MAXSIZE-1].cur=0; //头结点指向空 int k = S[0].cur; //k记录备用链表第一个结点 S[0].cur = i; //S[0].cur 指向链表第一个元素 int j; while(i){ //找到S最后一个结点 赋值给j j = i; i = S[i].cur; } S[j].cur = k; //链接两个链表 return OK; } //判空Status ListEmpty_SL(SLinkList S){ if(S[MAXSIZE-1].cur == 0) return TRUE; else return FALSE; } //取元素Status GetElem_SL(SLinkList S,int i,ElemType &e){ int j=1, k = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; if (i<1 || i > Length_SL(S)){ //判断位置是否合理 printf("查找位置不合理！"); return ERROR; } while (k && j<i){ //找到第i个位置 ++j; k = S[k].cur; } e = S[k].data; return OK;} //查找元素int LocateElem_SL(SLinkList S,ElemType e){ int i = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; int j = 0; while(i){ j++; if(S[i].data == e) return j; else i = S[i].cur; } if(!i){ printf("查无此元素！"); return ERROR; } } //找前驱 Status PriorElem_SL(SLinkList S, ElemType e, ElemType &cur_e) { int i = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; int j ; while (j){ j = S[i].cur; if (j && S[j].data == e){ cur_e = S[i].data; return OK; } i = j; } return ERROR; } //找后继 Status NextElem_SL(SLinkList S, ElemType e, ElemType &nex_e) { int i = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; int j; while (i){ j = S[i].cur; if (j && S[i].data == e){ nex_e = S[j].data; return OK; } i = j; } return ERROR; }//前插入Status Ins_SL(SLinkList S,int i,ElemType e){ int s; int j = 1; int k = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; if(i < 1 || i > Length_SL(S)+1){ printf("插入位置不合理"); return ERROR; } while( k && j <i-1 ){ j++; k = S[k].cur; } s = malloc_SL(S); S[s].data = e; S[s].cur = S[k].cur; S[k].cur = s; return OK; } //删除 Status ListDelete(SLinkList S, int i, ElemType &e) { int k = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; int j = 1, m; if (i<1 || i>Length_SL(S)){ //判断位置是否合理 printf("删除位置不合理！"); return ERROR; } while (k && j<i-1){ //找到第i-1个位置 ++j; k = S[k].cur; } m = S[k].cur; //m指向第i个位置 e = S[m].data; S[k].cur = S[m].cur; Free(S, m); //将空闲结点m释放到备用链表中 return OK; }void TravelList(SLinkList S){ int j = 0; int i = S[MAXSIZE-1].cur; while (i){ j++; printf("第%d个结点为：%d
", j, S[i].data); i = S[i].cur; }}int main(){ SLinkList S; ElemType e,cur_e,nex_e; int pos; return 0;}
